Name

Crit Effect

Type
Broken Nose The target takes 1d4 persistent bleed damage.

Bludgeoning
Two in a Row Deal normal damage to an additional target adjacent to the original target.

Piercing
Weapon Strike Deal normal damage to one of the target's weapons (applying Hardness normally).

Slashing
Nerve Damage Normal damage. The target is slowed 1 until healed.

Bomb or Spell
